Containers.Overview: Agent DVR is a standalone replacement for iSpy that runs as a service, uses less CPU and features a web user interface that is accessible from anywhere with no port forwarding required!
Containers.Description: Home Security[br] Integrated with Home Assistant, IFTTT and Alexa means Agent DVR can form a key part of your home security setup. Automate your alarms and set your cameras to start recording when you leave an area and disarm when you return using Geofencing.[br] Theft Prevention[br] Advanced object recognition and AI cut down on false alerts whilst protecting your investments. Recordings can be saved locally and to the cloud - ensuring evidence is secure even if the device itself is stolen.[br] Wildlife Watching[br] A discrete webcam reveals a wonderful world of wildlife. Agent DVR can record movement in a burrow or nest and send it straight to your email or mobile device.[br]
